plugins.name: Autolayout converter Helper
plugins.description:
Effortlessly locate frames and take control of your design exploration!!!


Navigate to complex Figma layers with ease! This plugin helps you traverse design hierarchies by stopping at frames and allowing you to decide the next move. Customize your search‚Äîpause anywhere and pick it up whenever you're ready (at that moment perform your change at layer‚ú® ). Perfect for designers and developers who need precise, targeted frame navigation.


Key Features :

  1. Start Search from Any Node : Begin traversal from any selected layer in your Figma file, drilling down through layers and frames.
  2. Stop on Frame Detection : Pauses at each frame, allowing you to review, edit, or proceed to the next frame.
  3. Customisable Navigation : Choose from Next to continue, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause as needed.


Use Cases :

  1. Designers and Developers : Streamline work on large, complex Figma files with multiple frames and layers.
  2. Efficient Frame Location : Locate frames quickly, without tedious manual scrolling.
  3. Auto Layout Validation : Essential for platforms or projects requiring strict auto layout adherence for accurate design and responsive outputs. This plugin helps ensure each frame aligns to the full auto layout setup, ensuring optimal structure and consistency.
  4. Flexible Layer Exploration : Customize your traversal to focus on only the layers that matter most for faster design reviews and targeted edits.


How to Use :

  1. Select your starting node in Figma, click Start, and let the plugin begin searching.
  2. When a layer is detected, choose Next to proceed, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause where desired.


Boost productivity, stay organized, and manage complex Figma designs with this efficient layers finding plugin. Ideal for design reviews, auto layout validation, focused edits, and streamlined development workflows!
plugins.tagline: Navigate layers with ease: control traversal and reduce your manual drilling time by 40%

plugins.description:
Effortlessly create custom icons in any style with StyleSnap ‚Äì the smart Figma plugin that brings AI-powered icon generation right where you work.


Whether you're designing a sleek UI or crafting a detailed illustration, StyleSnap lets you instantly replicate any icon style and generate new icons in seconds ‚Äì all royalty-free and within Figma.


Perfect for designers who love consistency, speed, and creativity.


üéØ Right-Click Style Capture: Instantly capture the style of any icon in your Figma file with a simple right-click.


üñåÔ∏è AI-Powered Icon Generation: Describe the icon you want, and StyleSnap will create it to match the style you selected ‚Äì from minimal to highly illustrative.


‚ôæÔ∏è Style Agnostic: Works with any style ‚Äì flat, outlined, detailed, 3D-inspired, or even hand-drawn.


üé® Perfect for UI & Illustrations: Whether you're building out a clean interface or adding a creative touch, StyleSnap generates icons that feel perfectly on-brand.


üîì Royalty-Free Icons: All generated icons are yours to use freely, with no licensing worries.


‚ö° No Asset Library Needed: Skip the endless searches. Just pick a style, describe your icon, and go.


üë®‚Äçüé® Great for Teams & Solo Designers: Maintain design consistency across projects without extra effort or asset juggling.


How to use the plugin?

plugins.name: Mercurius - Smart Exporter for WEBP, PNG, and JPG
plugins.description:
üé® Mercurius - Smart Exporter for WEBP, PNG, and JPG


Mercurius is a Figma plugin that analyzes and exports images in multiple formats (WEBP, PNG, or JPG) with AI-generated descriptions. The plugin uses OpenAI's API to generate accurate descriptions and suggest meaningful file names while automatically optimizing file size.


Quick Export Mode üì¶

For when you just need to export images quickly with optimization


  1. Select an image, frame, or component in Figma
  2. Click "Export Image" on the home screen
  3. You'll see: selected frame name, image dimensions, aspect ratio
  4. Configure export settings: choose format (WEBP, PNG, or JPG), set maximum file size in MB, select export scale (1x, 2x, 3x, 5x)
  5. Click "Export" to save your optimized image


AI-Powered Export Mode ü§ñ

For when you want AI assistance with descriptions and smart file naming


  1. Select an image, frame, or component in Figma
  2. First-time setup: Enter your OpenAI API key: the key will be securely saved for future use
  3. Click "Analyze Image" on the home screen
  4. The AI will analyze and provide: smart image description, SEO-friendly file name suggestion, image dimensions and aspect ratio
  5. Configure export settings: choose format (WEBP, PNG, or JPG), set maximum file size in MB, select export scale (1x, 2x, 3x, 5x)
  6. Click "Export" to save your image with the AI-suggested name



Both modes feature automatic image optimization to meet your file size requirements while maintaining the best possible quality.
plugins.tagline: Smart image analysis and export for WEBP, PNG, or JPG with GPT descriptions and size optimization

plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to visually highlight suspected components within a design, making it easier to locate and manage components. The plugin is ideal for users who need to inspect multiple components and interact with them quickly.


Function Description

‚Ä¢Highlight suspected components in selected frames.

‚Ä¢Locate and zoom into components within your Figma file.

‚Ä¢Export thumbnails of components for visual reference.

‚Ä¢Easily toggle component highlight on and off.


How to Use

1.Select one or more frames from your Figma file.

2.Click the ‚ÄúShow Component Highlight‚Äù button to highlight suspected components.

3.View the component list with thumbnails and names.

4.Click the ‚ÄúLocate‚Äù button to zoom in and select a specific component.

5.To remove the highlight, click ‚ÄúHide Component Highlight.‚Äù


Notes

‚Ä¢The highlighted components are based on the plugin‚Äôs interpretation and might not fully match actual component usage.

‚Ä¢The plugin‚Äôs results are for reference purposes and may vary depending on design complexity.

Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to visually highlight suspected components within a design, making it easier to locate and manage components. The plugin is ideal for users who need to inspect multiple components and interact with them quickly.


Function Description

‚Ä¢Highlight suspected components in selected frames.

‚Ä¢Locate and zoom into components within your Figma file.

‚Ä¢Export thumbnails of components for visual reference.

‚Ä¢Easily toggle component highlight on and off.


How to Use

1.Select one or more frames from your Figma file.

2.Click the ‚ÄúShow Component Highlight‚Äù button to highlight suspected components.

3.View the component list with thumbnails and names.

4.Click the ‚ÄúLocate‚Äù button to zoom in and select a specific component.

5.To remove the highlight, click ‚ÄúHide Component Highlight.‚Äù


Notes

‚Ä¢The highlighted components are based on the plugin‚Äôs interpretation and might not fully match actual component usage.

‚Ä¢The plugin‚Äôs results are for reference purposes and may vary depending on design complexity.

plugins.name: PageStream
plugins.description:
The ultimate Figma plugin you need to create, manage, and share Figma file templates. Whether you‚Äôre working solo or part of a large team, this plugin ensures consistency and efficiency when creating design projects. Sound interesting? Create your account and run the plug-in


How it works?

  1. Create and activate your account
  2. Go back to Figma
  3. Log in the plugin
  4. Start creating your templates


Why do I need an account?

You need to create an account to save your templates and use them anytime you need.


What you can do with PageStream?

  1. Generate different templates for your teams or kinds of projects.
  2. Edit or delete the different templates.
  3. Drag and drop the pages to reorganize the list easily when editing.
  4. Did we mention that you can SAVE your file templates?
  5. And YES! Of course you can add emojis


Why did we create PageStream?

We‚Äôre really passionate about creating and learning new things, and we absolutely love remote work and team collaboration.

We‚Äôve observed that many teams struggle with inconsistent files, which can make cross-functional and team collaboration a bit tricky. Moreover, all designers know that spending time creating pages can be pretty tedious. So, we challenged ourselves to solve these two problems over the weekend.


We have ideas for the next version, but please, if you have any recommendations or feedback, let us know. We hope you find this plugin handy!


Enjoy the day!
plugins.tagline: Create and save templates for your design file structure.

plugins.name: Round to 8
plugins.description:
Round to 8 helps you maintain consistent spacing and measurements in your designs by automatically rounding values to multiples of 4, 8, or any custom value.


üéØ Key Features:

‚Ä¢ Round multiple properties at once:

- Auto Layout (Padding & Spacing)

- Position (X & Y coordinates)

- Size (Width & Height)

- Font Size

- All Properties option


üé® Flexible Options:

‚Ä¢ Choose your rounding multiple:

- Multiple of 4

- Multiple of 8 (recommended for most designs)

- Custom value for specific needs


üîç Smart Selection:

‚Ä¢ Apply to selected elements only

‚Ä¢ Include all children elements

‚Ä¢ Preserve component instances


üí° Perfect For:

‚Ä¢ Maintaining consistent spacing in design systems

‚Ä¢ Cleaning up imported designs

‚Ä¢ Ensuring pixel-perfect layouts

‚Ä¢ Standardizing measurements across teams


‚ö°Ô∏è Quick Tips:

1. Select any frame or component

2. Choose properties to round

3. Pick your preferred multiple

4. Click Apply and watch the magic happen!


Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è for the Figma Community
plugins.tagline: Round your design values to consistent multiples for pixel-perfect layouts

plugins.name: A11y Helper - Test for Accessibility
plugins.description:
This plugin aims to help UX/UI designers integrate accessibility awareness and thoughtful design throughout their workflows.


Test elements of your design with integrated colour-blindness simulation, contrast, text size, hierarchy and ALT-text checkers.


I'll be adding to the plugin over the next few months, with features such as,

  1. Automated fixes such as quick text colour adjustment to meet contrast requirements, and colour suggestions
  2. Batch processing & (hopefully) accessibility report generation
plugins.tagline: Make accessibility a priority at every step.

127447.name: A11y Helper - Test for Accessibility
127447.description:
This plugin aims to help UX/UI designers integrate accessibility awareness and thoughtful design throughout their workflows.


Test elements of your design with integrated colour-blindness simulation, contrast, text size, hierarchy and ALT-text checkers.


I'll be adding to the plugin over the next few months, with features such as,

  1. Automated fixes such as quick text colour adjustment to meet contrast requirements, and colour suggestions
  2. Batch processing & (hopefully) accessibility report generation
127447.release_notes: Fixed the issue where framed text that has a background fill would be misinterpreted as text on white background.
127447.tagline: Make accessibility a priority at every step.

plugins.name: FillGPT
plugins.description:
FillGPT is an AI-powered Figma plugin designed to improve workflow efficiency by automating content generation, text optimization, and design analysis. It helps designers, copywriters, and product teams enhance UI copy, rename layers, and analyze design best practices.


Key features:


- Smart layer renaming to keep files organized

- AI-generated content for UI elements and marketing copy

- Copy enhancement, including expanding, shortening, and rephrasing text

- Tone and style adjustment to match different contexts

- Design analysis to improve clarity, accessibility, and readability

- Grammar and spelling error detection and correction

- Text summarization and expansion for better content flow


FillGPT streamlines the design process, ensuring high-quality text and a more efficient workflow within Figma.

plugins.name: FigTidy - Organize your Figma Pages
plugins.description:
Tired of manually rearranging frames or creating sections? FigTidy automates your layout process so you can focus on designing. Quickly organise frames, add consistent spacing/padding, and create new sections in empty areas‚Äîno overlap required.


Features

‚Ä¢ Automatic Arrangement: Choose horizontal or vertical layouts, plus advanced settings like max width and spacing.

‚Ä¢ Section Creation: Add a background colour, corner radius, and a clear section title‚Äîperfect for design system docs or style guides.

‚Ä¢ No Overlaps: FigTidy scans for existing sections, then places your new section in an empty spot.

‚Ä¢ Advanced Settings: Tweak spacing, padding, and max width in an accordion panel for a neat UI.


Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è by Faizan ‚Äì Because every Figma page deserves a tidy layout!

plugins.name: Typosys
plugins.description:
Typosys is a Figma plugin designed to simplify and accelerate the creation and management of typography systems.

By selecting a base font and size, you can effortlessly generate styles that scale proportionally. The plugin supports custom naming, font faces, weights, sizes, line heights, and letter spacing. It also introduces a multi-dimensional mode system, allowing you to tailor styles for specific devices like desktop, tablet, and mobile. Once completed, the styles are imported into Figma, fully linked to dynamically generated variable collections.



Benefits


  1. Faster workflow: Set up your typography system in minutes.
  2. Consistent scaling: Styles are proportional to the base size for a cohesive design.
  3. Flexibility: Each style can be individually customized.
  4. Device-specific optimization: Use modes to adjust styles for different screen sizes.
  5. Variable integration: Styles are automatically connected to dynamic Figma variable collections.



Key Features


  1. Base font and size selection
  2. Proportional typography style generation
  3. Customizable font face, weight, size, line-height, and letter-spacing
  4. Mode-based dimensions (Desktop, Tablet, Mobile)
  5. Automatic variable generation and linking
  6. One-click import

accepted.name: Roland Hidvegi
accepted.description: Roland Hidvegi is a Product Designer ‚Äî crafting digital experiences, from vision to final touches, passionate about creating things that make people happy.

plugins.tagline: Streamline your typography system in seconds.
